Talk01_11_Rain_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is Olkin's field where he grows his
fortified pumpkins.

We came up with a new<clr:0000> method of
defending while attacking <clr:ffff>right here, as
I listened to him talk about pumpkins.
Any interest in hearin' about that
method? Glad to tell you all about it.
Talk01_11_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>What is it? Still need something?


Are you interested in our new <clr:0000>method of
defending while attacking<clr:ffff>?
talk24: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Olkin and I stand united for this village!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
ReturnHome_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>You've made your last mistake, sneaking
into my house! <sp:5:0:0>I'll give you a taste of the
technique that Olkin and I...<sp:5:1:0>
...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Aren't you the one who helped us out?<sp:0:4:0>It's getting late. If there's something you
have to discuss with me, I hope it can
keep until tomorrow.
talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You want swift carrots? You gotta go
buy 'em at <clr:0000>my old lady's shop<clr:ffff>. The
carrots here aren't fully grown anyway.
ReturnHome_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, it's only you...<sp:0:4:0>It's getting late. If there's something you
have to discuss with me, I hope it can
keep until tomorrow.
talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>These swift carrots need more time in
the ground. Head to <clr:0000>my old lady's shop<clr:ffff>
if you want to eat some of those.
Talk01_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Didn't expect you to come talkin' to
me again.

I bet you're interested in our new <clr:0000>method
of defending while attacking<clr:ffff>.
Talk01_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm gonna be workin' in Olkin's field too,
now and then.

Olkin and I didn't help much at all with
those creatures outside the village. We
can help each other now, in our fields.
Never thought I'd hoe the same row
with Olkin on anything.

But I gotta credit him with us comin'
up with the <clr:0000>method of defending
while attacking<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Any interest in hearin' about it?
Talk01_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What is it? I've got work here in Olkin's
field to do.

But glad to tell you about our <clr:0000>method of
defending while attacking<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Any interest in hearin' about it?
talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you eat a swift carrot cooked into a
dish, you can <clr:0000>move more quickly<clr:ffff>.

The carrot's essence will race through
your body, helping you move like
the wind.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm sure that if someone like you eats
that kind of dish, no one would be able
to keep up!
CarrotGarden_Npc_Kakariko013_Water_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you trying to help with my carrots?


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>Haha! That's really something.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I get why. You know how important
swift carrots are. What you don't know...<sp:5:0:0>
is how tricky this kind of gardening is.
So, thank you. But please leave it to me.
PumpkinGarden_Npc_Kakariko013_Water_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you trying to help take care of
Olkin's pumpkins?

He knows best when it comes to taking
care of this garden.

So, no need to pitch in here. You can
rely on us to handle it.
Talk01_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Olkin's the one around here who really
knows what I'm made of. It's not a
stretch to say he's a friend.
They say keep your friends close and
your enemies closer—but turns out that
enemies can turn into friends too.
Thanks to him, we've come up with a new
<clr:0000>method of defending while attacking<clr:ffff>.

Any interest in hearin' about that?
Glad to share it.
CarrotGarden_Npc_Kakariko013_Water_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you trying to help with my carrots?


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>Haha! That's really something.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I get why. You know how important
swift carrots are.

But it's raining, so they're getting the
right amount of water as it is.

So, there's no need to help here. Please
leave it to me.
PumpkinGarden_Npc_Kakariko013_Water_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you trying to help take care of 
Olkin's pumpkins?

But it's raining, so they're getting the
right amount of water as it is.

So, no need to pitch in here. You can
rely on us to handle it.
talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>My old lady's shop sells my carrots and
Olkin's pumpkins. I'd say it's always
worth payin' her a visit.
Talk_Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Ah, it's you! Training this early in
the morning?
talk33:
That's an impressive carrot. You might
be reprimanded if you take it.
talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Ah, it's you!


That battle we were caught up in recently
was amazing.

You beat those monsters AND opened our
eyes. I've gotta thank you for all of that.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Olkin and I have been at odds for ages.
Now we're tending each other's field
because of you.
I wouldn't have guessed I'd ever find
any pleasure in his company.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>One more thing. When Olkin and I were
talkin', we figured out a <clr:0000>method for
defending while attacking<clr:ffff>.
Any interest in hearin' about it?
Talk_Greeting_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>What do you want at this hour? Be
careful, please! Monsters are more
active at—
Well, I guess I don't need to tell that to
a warrior like you.
Talk_Greeting_04: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Ah, it's you! Training even on rainy days?
Talk_Greeting_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>You...dressin' like that...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>We'd never mistake you for those scum, 
but others here aren't gonna look on
you kindly.
talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>With only a weapon in hand, you can't
defend yourself...<sp:5:1:0>normally.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>But <clr:0000>attach a shield to your weapon<clr:ffff>, then
you might be able to defend yourself
after all.
I'd have never come up with that idea on
my own. Groundbreaking stuff! I gotta
give most of the credit to Olkin.
Combining your strength with that of
others is pretty key, in my opinion.
talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>Ha, but I guess you'd know all about that
already, a warrior as skilled as you.

Hope my talk here wasn't too much
bother. Now, you stay well, all right?
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's more or less what I said before.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>You can defend yourself while attacking if
you <clr:0000>attach a shield to your weapon<clr:ffff>. It's
a new idea, mostly thanks to Olkin.
See how useful it is to combine your
strength with that of others? A good
thing to do, no matter what your goal is.
talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>Ha, I guess a warrior as skilled as you
would know all about this.

<sp:3:0:2:0500>But here's another thing. I can't say that
I like your look.

We'd never mistake you for that scum,
but others in this village fear those
who wear such things.
talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That look of yours isn't gonna be
welcome here.

We'd never mistake you for those scum,
but others in this village fear those
who wear such things.
